Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim and body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, both the interior and exterior are covered with traces of a light-brown slip, remains of one line of incised Coptic text survive beneath rim.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394329) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394329)
